name: Slash n' Dash
description:
Kill enemies before they kill you. 
Find the boss room and kill the boss to win.

Controls:
WSAD/Arrow keys to move
LMB to attack         RMB to dash

If you time your attacks perfectly, you will deal a critical hit - every critical hit increases your damage for your combo.

After not taking damage for 5 seconds, you will start healing - use it to heal between fights or if you're good enough - even in battle!
